meanings.definition: Combine (a number of things) into a coherent whole.
meanings.sent1: She synthesizes different colors to create a beautiful painting.
meanings.sent2: The chef synthesizes various ingredients to make a delicious soup.
meanings.sent3: The magician synthesizes ordinary cards into a deck of wonders.
meanings.sent4: His speech synthesizes passion and logic, captivating the audience.
meanings.sent5: The artist synthesizes light and shadow to bring depth to the artwork.

meanings.sent1: The scientist synthesizes a new medicine to treat the illness.
meanings.sent2: The lab technician synthesizes compounds for the experiment.
meanings.sent3: The alchemist synthesizes a potion that grants invisibility.
meanings.sent4: Nature synthesizes elements to form the building blocks of life.
meanings.sent5: The pharmacist synthesizes the perfect blend of ingredients for the ointment.

meanings.definition: Combine (constituent elements) into a single or unified entity.
meanings.sent1: The composer synthesizes different melodies into a symphony.
meanings.sent2: The designer synthesizes fabrics to create a unique dress.
meanings.sent3: The architect synthesizes traditional and modern styles in the building.
meanings.sent4: The team leader synthesizes individual efforts into a successful project.
meanings.sent5: The chef synthesizes flavors to craft a harmonious dish.
